about_the_game:
An epidemic of flower disease destroys a prosperous village, and the only survivor is the son of a tailor and a witch doctor. His days are numbered: the first symptoms of the incurable disease have manifested themselves, and all the doors of the kingdom are closing in front of the boy. All but one.

The unsociable owner of the fading estate, who hides his face under a sinister mask, gives the emaciated traveler refuge among other unusual guests. A circus acrobat, two thugs from the high road and a noble knight and his arrogant young master share a common misfortune: they are living out their last days here, hoping for a miraculous rescue. And the estate owner turns out to be a skillful healer, whose methods are not approved by the church or the medical community.

The hero becomes a pawn in Dr. Kinderwood's chess game with death. A pawn that can turn into any piece.

Demo

Spend the first three days in the infirmary: get to know its inhabitants or focus on finding a cure.

  • Point-and-click movement between locations and interaction with items.

  • Illuminate active areas for interaction.

  • Accept the consequences of the result of your active actions with a mini-game.

  • Character Relationships.

  • The plot is constantly moving forward.

  • No music (work in progress, will be added later in an update to the demo).

Translations (demo version)

  • Original game language: Russian.

  • Edited English translation.

  • MTL translation into other languages.

You can help us improve the translation by clicking the copy text button in the game and sending a report to our Discord server.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.0
